scripts.start: concurrently "npm run clean" "npm run watch" "npm run build:vendor" "npm run server"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run clean" "npm run build:js" "npm run build:vendor" "npm run build:css" "npm run build:html"
scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:html"
scripts.build:html: cp source/html/* app/component && mv app/component/index.html app
scripts.watch:css: npm run build:css && node-sass -w source/scss/styles.scss app/styles.css
